title: Android Developer Options Explained: Hereâ€™s everything you can do with these settings
content:
Most Android smartphones and tablets already have dozens (or even hundreds) of settings for changing everything from notifications to system colors. There are even more settings hidden away in the Developer options, which are mostly intended to help with creating Android applications, but some of them can come in handy for other situations too. Even

The post Android Developer Options Explained: Here’s everything you can do with these settings appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Android ships with a whole bunch of Developer Options that can unlock experimental and debugging features. Here's what these options do.
